name: OrthoRoute GPU Autorouter
description: GPU-accelerated PCB autorouter using CuPy/CUDA with real-time visualization
description_full:
OrthoRoute is a high-performance GPU-accelerated PCB autorouter that leverages NVIDIA CUDA through CuPy for parallel routing algorithms using KiCad's modern IPC API. Features include:

• GPU-accelerated wavefront routing with conflict resolution
• Process isolation for maximum KiCad stability
• Real-time visualization of routing progress
• Support for multi-layer boards
• Configurable grid pitch and routing parameters
• Batch processing for improved performance
• Compatible with complex PCB designs

Requirements:
• KiCad 9.0+ with IPC API support
• NVIDIA GPU with CUDA support
• CUDA Toolkit 11.8+ or 12.x
• CuPy package (install with: pip install cupy-cuda12x)
